title: ariinv
author: ariinv
content: ARII Trading Competition linkEvent Duration: August 22, 2022, 06:00 UTC - September 4, 2022, 06:00 UTCPrize Pool: 100,000 ARII*Event eligibility requirement: A minimum of 100 PROB must be staked in order to be eligible for this event and staked PROB can’t be decreased during the competition duration.Stake PROB: https://www.probit.com/en-us/stake/PROBStaking guide: https://www.probit.com/en-us/hc/360039717011▶ Trade ARII, Earn ARIIA trading competition will be held for the ARII/USDT trading pair. A total of 100,000 ARII will be distributed to the Top 10 volume traders in this order.1st place: 20,000 ARII2nd place: 15,000 ARII3rd place: 12,000 ARII4th place: 10,000 ARII5th place: 9,000 ARII6th place: 8,500 ARII7th place: 8,000 ARII8th place: 7,000 ARII9th place: 5,500 ARII10th place: 5,000 ARII*Earn lower trading fees by staking PROBStaking PROB will unlock lower trading fees based on your membership level which is determined by how much you stake. Higher PROB staking amounts receive the lowest trading fees so stake your PROB to start enjoying the benefits.For more on trading fees, please refer here: https://www.probit.com/en-us/trading-feeStake PROB: https://www.probit.com/en-us/hc/360039717011▶ Terms:A minimum of 100 PROB must be staked to join all trading competitions.Users’ staked PROB can’t be decreased during the competition duration.Trading competition rankings will be determined according to the USDT converted total trading volume: (https://www.probit.com/en-us/hc/360039482652).ProBit Global reserves the right to cancel or amend the event rules with sole discretion.ProBit Global reserves the right for final interpretation of the results of these events.In the case of a tie, PROB holding amount will be used to determine the winner.

comments.author: ariinv
comments.body: Dear Aristo HoldersWe had a short but successful journey together; your token has been listed in a good exchange, and we are negotiating with other exchanges to find the second one and filling documents to list The Aristo Powerful token on www.coinmarketcap.com and www.coingecko.com.We want to remind you that listing on the two websites mentioned above is impossible before listing in an exchange and getting related approvals.The most important issue for growing an asset is networking. The upcoming Trading campaign needs to get viral to achieve better results. Now up to seventy percent of tokens belong to holders; then, it will be significant that you help your community to grow by reposting content on all other social media and groups that you know and is your favorite. We have holders from Australia to Canada worldwide, and you know your community better and can promote your token and get rich. We established the road to your success. It's time for you to run and catch all you wish and dream.
